attributes.title: 0.5L Bottle of Fiji Water
attributes.description:
Created on February 24, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

Ask Pablo estimates this impact at 250g per 1 L bottle. By my estimation, the bottle in Fiji has 140g of CO2e, and this balloons to 460g CO2e once it arrives in Boston.
